website_summaries.verdict: The best way to get the Old World feel and charm in an extremely affordable chandelier package. Uses real candles to provide light.
pros: Golden finish is extremely wear resistant
Will keep the chandelier lasting for a long time without major blemishes
cons: Wrought iron makes the chandelier extremely heavy and difficult to mount securely

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: After reading the other reviews it met expectations. Color is grayish white. At a distance it looks quite nice, up close it's a bit inexpensive looking. One oddity is an empty circle at the top that is visible when looking up at the item. We filled it with a decorative blue knob from the hardware store, and some would putty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shabby Chic Perfection for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, solid, paint color a cream, easy to put together. I added some magnetic crystals, battery operated candles, and hung it up. Perfect for my she-shed chicken coop. The finishing touch. Would I order more of these OH YES. I read other reviews and none of my parts were broken, chipped, or bent. Maybe I was lucky or their quality control had gotten better. Magnetic crystals are from amazon and used little magnetic jewelry claw clasp I also found on amazon to hang the crystals. Same with a package of 10 battery operated candles with remote
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: amazingly gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: i have bought these before and now i bought more to have all over my house!! they are great!! i bought taper candles with remote also from amazon and they are great !! also amazon batteries!! easy to use these chandilers do the job and look amazing!! in doors and out!! fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: laura Rebecca Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier was exactly what I was looking for. It is actually white .. I spray painted it gold. It’s perfect in my daughter room!
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for a space where there is no electrical connection. I love it and goes so well with my decor. I added some crystals to add some elegance. Get it, don’t think twice
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the mail, and a little crooked, but generally nice and great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I'm happy. It is more cream than gold (which is what I wanted, but a lighter color than the picture). One of the candle holders had broken off when it arrived, and many of them are a bit crooked. I hot-glued the holder back on, and since it's an outdoor chandelier, for my purposes it's just fine. It's beautiful and I get compliments a lot, so I'm happy enough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not Consistent Color/paint - but decent bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Substantial chandelier for the cost. Makes a nice statement - not too tiny or big - good size. Only disappointed in the color. I loved the greenish/white rustic look of some of the review pictures - but the one I received was pretty white - I can definitely antique it a bit myself though. Super cute with some added crystals!
customer_reviews.author: Melita

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed chandelier, however, the candle holder bases are not formed large enough to hold a standard taper candle and some of these holders were crooked---I fixed it w/ the heavy duty E/Epoxy 6000 glue which did work to hold the candles in place, however, I felt I should not have had to reconstruct this chandelier when it was brand new===Still like the overall effect, though, for my new 'She Shed'
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Kidd

customer_reviews.title: This is what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a "chandelier" for our patio outside and so have looked at many products and price ranges. When I saw this one I knew it was what I was looking for. We also bought some flickering battery operated candles and the look is perfect! I like this "candelier" because I can add some "bling" to it or leave it as is. Great product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melora N.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!!! We put solar lights inside and used for pergola- really pretty
customer_reviews.author: AnnieD

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. The chandelier was solid cream with no green patina. It looked nothing like the picture. There was no mention that the item shipped from Canada, therefore, the return postage was twice the cost of the item. I now have 2 chandeliers that I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice.
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much, although mine was all white. Not bright white, and I can make it look antique easily. But just so you know--you may not get any kind of patina effect. It's also a bit larger than I expected, which I'm happy about--it would work in any room, not just my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: black mantis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang outside in our oak tree and planned to use with flameless candles but this product is garbage. Many of the leaves are bent and can’t be unbent without cracking the finish. The candle holders are cheap and 2 broke when I assembled it so I had to hot glue them. Don’t waste your $.
customer_reviews.author: tracy g

customer_reviews.title: love this candle chandelier
customer_reviews.text: shabby chic it is.....some said it was greenish cream in color, but i've found it not true. I did however get the idea to paint it to match the decor from others, so am painting it an off white. I bought the LED tapers on a remote and am excited about how this will work together. Candles were sold in lots of 4 so I had to buy 2 lots for the fixture which requires 6.
customer_reviews.author: Rosierobins

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over tighten when assembling
customer_reviews.text: Be careful screwing on holders if you over tighten they will snap. I had to dodger on. Over all look and quality is legit for the price
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Stop thinking, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It is a great value for the price as the chandelier is sturdy and larger than I expected. Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for out on our gazebo. Painted it black and put LED lights in it. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Kinda junky and arrived bent and broken
customer_reviews.text: Really more of an odd cream color but was easily painted. One sconce broken off and another bent. If you don’t need it to be very nice (use outdoors etc.) it is an ok deal for the money. Otherwise look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Boo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The color of the chandelier was pretty close to the picture. However it is more of a light olive green with ivory dripped and painted over top of the green - very sloppy I might add! Very easy assembly, but unfortunately the box I received had previously been opened and then re-taped with the main piece MISSING for the bottom of the chandelier, making it impossible to stabilize. I now have to find a decorative screwable end/bottom piece for it before I can hang it. :( I'd rather do that then send it back because who nows what the next one would be like. Just beware.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Rutz

customer_reviews.title: Needed some parts
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but was missing parts husband had to go to local hardware to purchase parts and had to drill holes that were not completed for screws to fit in
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: It’s a adorable chandelier. Definitely worth the price good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a adorable chandelier. Definitely worth the price good quality. Candle holders were all straight. After reading reviews some mentioned holders were bent. The color is a distressed cream.
customer_reviews.author: joyce varsek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your patio!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. It came ahead of schedule, well packed. The color on my computer made the product look white but the actual product has a faux patina (greenish), which I liked more for my patio. It came mostly put together, with only minimal things to screw together. (My six year old was able to put one together) The chain and S hook are already attatched so it was ready to hang. I just purchased a third for my long patio/porch. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic find. I haven't been able to find anything like this in local stores. It even came with the chain. I put it together myself and it looks beautiful hanging on the front porch of my Victorian house.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and is ideal for those led candles
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have ordered. I have them suspended on a patio under my deck. It looks great and is ideal for those led candles. I recommend this product as a relatively low cost solution for providing a romantic ambience no matter the location
customer_reviews.author: ferrbo

customer_reviews.title: It was beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: used this for my daughters wdeding. I hung it above the couple on the pergola, with flickering electric candles, and white sheers. It was beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Tallana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So easy to put together, great shabby chic in a room which had no lights. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. This uses tiny thin candles. Not the regular size. Still cute
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely look with candles but candle tubes and pans crooked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to hang over my dining room table. They look as described and are what I wanted. The only complaint that I do have is that not all of the candle tubes in the pan platform are set straight. Some are crooked and when inserting a candle, it leans. This creates crooked candles and a drip mess below. I've tried to gently position the metal pan platforms to lean differently. I realize the only way that I will be successful in getting all of these straight is to heat the metal and re-work it. I have not had the time to do so yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, easy to assemble, good size for an arch.
customer_reviews.text: Great item, easy to assemble. I bought some drop crystals and faux candles to finish it off. It will be used for a wedding arch.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L. Henschen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: color looked gold in the picture...its off white! I haven't tried to put it together yet.
customer_reviews.author: HBarlow

customer_reviews.title: ... product (at least the one I received) looks nothing like the picture of it
customer_reviews.text: This product (at least the one I received) looks nothing like the picture of it. The one I got is a dirty (and I do mean DIRTY) off white color. I can't even paint it until it is cleaned up. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gore

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier fits into any decor and is very easy to put together. Be careful if you plan use it in drywall, it is heavy and may require the use of wall anchors for stability.
customer_reviews.author: Parent of Two Girls

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I expected. I will tell my friends to take a look too. This will be just the touch needed for my powder room to make it special.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful hanging from the branches of my trees. I have a beautiful vintage bench that is white so I sprayed them to match and it looks great. Not a bad price either.
customer_reviews.author: margaret stadler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my chandelier yesterday, and was very disappointed to see its colour and the marks that were on it. The colour was different from the picture shown and had many dirt marks on it. The candle holders were not levelled and had unnecessary holes in it. It was not a good buy. Its look is not like new at all. It looks like a used piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is really a nice looking shabby chic chandelier
customer_reviews.text: It is really a nice looking shabby chic chandelier. I wish the openings on the candle holder would hold a tea light, votive size candle but we made it work!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for how I wanted to use it. I spray-painted it glossy cherry red and hung it in the center of the new pergola we had built. With bright cushions on the deck furniture and a new indoor/outdoor carpet, the deck looks great. The color is not as depicted. It's a muted light green. But if that's an o.k. color for you, it wouldn't need to be repainted. It just looked antiqued, sort of like the green that copper gets as it ages. For the price, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: It looked good in the photo when I ordered it, but looked GREAT when it actually got here. Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Goettl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for outside or inside
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful for outside or inside! We love it. Dollar Tree has the perfect battery powered candles that fit great. The off white color is done well and can be changed so easily with a can of paint! A great buy! I had paid more for a similar at a junk store. I gave that one to a family member because this one was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value!! I sprayed it silver and put solar lights in it and turned it into an amazing outdoor chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Still Scooping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, large size, on long chain. Ordering another one now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The price was great for what you get. It could be painted ANY color you like, but looks good the way it is. Made to look that aged green color. I chose to stick with it the same. I ordered the "Set of 3 Mini Battery Operated Wax Dipped LED Taper Candles- Amber Flicker" and wasn't sure if they would fit but they are perfect. I can't wait to use this at the Wedding reception.
customer_reviews.author: M. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made candle holder welds
customer_reviews.text: Candle holders are cheaply welded on & one broke off immediately after first use
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to a space.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and great deal. On other sites for triple the price.
customer_reviews.author: R3

customer_reviews.title: I really love this chandler
customer_reviews.text: I really love this chandler, but we had to drill a hole to fit the screws in during assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Ann G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great in my bathroom, found battery operated candles for it
customer_reviews.author: G. Lock

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It does have a greenish color but I used black paint and went around the edges and it look fabulous. Looks vintage!!
customer_reviews.author: Vadessa Flack

customer_reviews.title: It's really cute though and easily
customer_reviews.text: Beginning to rust in just 1 month. It's really cute though and easily painted
customer_reviews.author: toni scott

customer_reviews.title: I still absolutely love it and Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived as stated. The bottom is bent a little, but I can live with that. I still absolutely love it and Happy with the purchase. You can not beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jovette Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my use. And color was perfect as well. Hung inside canopy for wedding so had to remove the taper holders so votives would fit, but knew that when I ordered. I needed a particular size & shape & this one worked great. Assembled fast & easy enough to fold & store.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Frye

customer_reviews.title: Love tnis chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Love tnis chandelier! The shabby white is perfect for undery gazebo. The remote control candles make it very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Art Fink

customer_reviews.title: Very shoddy made, the welding is off center in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very shoddy made, the welding is off center in many places., the candle holders are welded on crooked so the candles don't even stand up straight had to try to bend things just to get it straight, had to reweld certain areas
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E Maio

customer_reviews.title: Still in shock
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!!!....so pleasantly surprised, not at all what I expected, easy to assemble, bigger than I thought, heavy weight materials, looks great with my decors, so happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: raines

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is sooo beautiful! I decided to add vanilla candles and lots of vintage teardrop crystals to mine...and I am so pleased! I love the price for it too! I would highly recommend it for anyone who loves vintage decorating like myself!
customer_reviews.author: XoXo

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This was my birthday present from my hubby for our cabin and it looks amazing there! Adds a bit of shabby chic to our loggy cabin in the woods; just what it needed. Daughter is going to snag it for her wedding reception. I think you would not lose buying this for almost any lady in your life, either for outdoors or inside.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas P.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! I love the color and it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ! I love the color and it looks beautiful over my master tub. I purchased the remote control candles for it and it's hit!'
customer_reviews.author: MBT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hang over the tub in master bath. Great size. Easy to assemble - just open up and screw on base. Color is slightly greenish not as cream as the picture, but looks great I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cjbooks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier! Arrived in fantastic condition and quickly. Definitely a wonderful addition to our master bath. Item is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jesterb

customer_reviews.title: crude design
customer_reviews.text: This item does not have the quality I would expect for something that is priced in the $60+ range. When it cam on sale in the $30+ range, I thought I had a steal, if I had seen this chandelier at a local shop, I doubt that I would have paid more than $20 for it without having immediate buyer's remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as stated. The green cast gives it a vintage look, once up you actually can barely notice the green cast. I used it @ the altar for my wedding and it looked AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C.

customer_reviews.title: better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. It is rustic and pretty. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: The Chandeliers looked exactly like the picture. They are good quality and will be perfect for my wedding. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: alex cervi

customer_reviews.title: But it only looked dirty. Its okay though because I knew I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine was off white with some brownish streaks that were supposed to make it look shabby chic/weathered. But it only looked dirty. Its okay though because I knew I was going to have to spray paint it yellow. I got a pastel shade. I like it now :)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: This product came on time and was exactly what I expected! It definitly is a shade of green so I will be spray painting it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fisk

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but the color was a little more green than appears in pic. I painted it and it is great!
customer_reviews.author: jenny reed

customer_reviews.title: Great company and awesome CSR (wish I could remember her name). Love this chandelier.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had posted a review on my purchase of this chandelier last summer but I don't see it, so I'm going to do a quick one because this company was awesome to work with. I ordered this to decorate for my son's vintage wedding this past September. Upon receipt, it definitely was different and had some damage to it however time was a factor in my getting it ready so quick action was necessary. Made a call to the company, spoke with a wonderful young lady who took charge and rectified the situation immediately. Problem solved, chandelier beautiful, wedding gorgeous! Company awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cool Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this candelabra!!! I added some crystals and remote controlled taper candles. It was super easy to assemble. I had it hanging within 5 minutes. I would describe the color as ivory. It is very well made, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Stunner
customer_reviews.text: Spray painted this item and used real candles on this chandelier. I placed color coordinating flowers on the inside and a hung it outside on a low hanging tree limb close to my patio. I hung a landscaping light just above it and at night when the lights turn on it looks like the candles are lit. Very nice effect for little expense. Try it you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, although candles that it's tagged to buy with ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, although candles that it's tagged to buy with it are really too small in diameter to stand up correctly. Will need something at base to hold them in better. Someone asked me a question and I've lost their email about size of holders and "candles" listed. I'm adding measurements in photos! I'm sorry I lost your email!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a small chandelier and luckily found this one. There were many great reviews so I felt confident that the product was going to be what I was looking for. It is pretty light weight so i didn't have to worry about having it secured so much to make my cement ceiling looking ugly. I purchased candles locally and since it didn't sit well on the chandelier, I attached foam tape around the candle, and it worked perfectly. Also, it was spray painted black and looks so beautiful! The item was shipped to a military overseas address and I had to pay extra to the vendor. I'm very satisfied so that was still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute in my daughter's room. I bought some battery tapers with remote and she sleeps with it on every night. Nice alternative when you can't add an electric chandelier!
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chandelier and can be customized!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty with a lot of potential. I added some crystal pendants and beads. I used the battery lights, but they aren't very bright. It is more for decoration. I think you could put a light bulb on a cord down the middle of it and it would provide much more illumination. For the money and appearance, it is a bargain! I put it above my staircase landing for additional decoration and lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Victorian decorator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a whimsical additon to my newly redone bathroom. The colors are darker and lean more towards blue rather than green. It still looks great above my deep tub but, if you are looking for a sage and cream mix this is not for you. The paint was a little flaky. I was going for the shabby chic look, and do not plan on actually touching it and lighting the candles so, this did not bother me. The metal arms when put together are a little crooked so I advise buying some candle adhesive to put in the holders so your candles will stand up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Wife

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend this unless you're handy!
customer_reviews.text: Just so - so product! Two of the candle dishes are welded on crooked. I tried to straighten. They did move enough to allow me to shave the candle bottoms to make them stand straight. Oh yes, antique paint job is terrible, had to repaint with hammer finish paint. Candles still loose but will never light them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Doug & Jean

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for me as a birthday gift from my wish list and it is exactly what I was hoping for. It is going over my new soaker tub. Since you can't have an electric fixture above a tub it is the perfect solution. It's the right size and the color I wanted. Some reviews said they were greenish, but mine is a nice shabby chic beige. I just ordered battery operated tapers for it and plan to bling it up with some crystal garland and crystal drops.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Item seems much cheaper in person.. Mostly white with minimal attempt to give a antique finish. Photo doesn't show the way it is secured at base ( poorly done ).its ok but don't expect as pictured. 2.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and easy to repack flat.
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is designed to be taken down and re-packed flat for storage or travel, which made it perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bingham-May

customer_reviews.title: ... hung this in my daughter's room and it fits beautifully! We didn't even bother with candles up there
customer_reviews.text: I hung this in my daughter's room and it fits beautifully! We didn't even bother with candles up there, it looks elegant and perfect as is. You'll need a swag hook to attach it to the wall and I doubled the chain up/hung two rings on the hook so it wasn't as long and ended up being more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for porch
customer_reviews.text: Color was just as pictured. Nice complement to my moss rug. It is a creamy/light muted green. It is also a nice size to hang above a table. The price was good and I am very happy with this purchase. Just received it so not sure how it will hold up to the weather, but it can be easily spray painted if weather effects it or if you decide to change the color.
customer_reviews.author: John Omara

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to put in our backyard pergola and it works perfectly. It was super fast to assemble, looks great, and after being out in the weather for many months (including storms and some freezing weather), it still looks great. Just hang this up, add some candles, and let the compliments roll!
customer_reviews.author: M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor chandelier.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Hot glued solar lights and used as outdoor chandelier. 4 stars as there weren't pre-drilled holes at bottom of chandelier arms for bottom plate. Sprayed Rustoleum just in case. I will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: MedStudentStar

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Prop for Elementary School Production of Beauty & the Beast!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone commented that it was the perfect finishing touch--took the usual painted cardboard up a dozen notches! Must add that it was a tad greener than I expected when I unpacked it. Perhaps a bit overboard on the faux patina. Still suited our purpose nicely. We hung some wedding crystal beads from the swirled metal at the bottom. We used battery-operated LED tapers that worked perfectly (just needed access right before performance), and didn't have to mess with getting electrical to center stage for the 18th century set!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful. I have it hanging outside over my table. I want to order another one for inside my house.
customer_reviews.author: JulieVS

customer_reviews.title: It was more than perfect..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my screened in porch at our lake cabin...I was so surprised at the quality of the piece...I never expected that based on the price...It was more than perfect...and it goes so well in the room...will buy more from this company...thanks so much for the beautiful light....
customer_reviews.author: Sherry in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Mine was a pale cream color like pictured and I used gold spray paint very lightly ...
customer_reviews.text: Am so excited about this! Mine was a pale cream color like pictured and I used gold spray paint very lightly to give it an antique look. I am hanging it in my bedroom and using battery operated candles. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: 2754oly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this chandelier. It arrived really fast. It is definitely green but I will be spray painting it silver and add crystals to it. I already know when I'm done with it, it will look like I spend a couple hundred dollars on it. I am putting it in my bedroom which is huge in interior decorating right now. I also like that it does not need to be wired. I will be purchasing another one for another room. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Faith760

customer_reviews.title: it's cream
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why it came green for others. This came quickly, properly packed and looks like an antique cream. It's beautiful, just have to figure out how to hang it!
customer_reviews.author: blisskitty

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a queen
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier looks like vintage royalty. It was much bigger than I expected which I loved and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shabby Chic Winner!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor chandelier is really pretty and it does look old and perfect "shabby chic" . It is affordable also.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Perfect addition to my outdoor awning. Minimal assembly required but no tools. One post said the color had a green to it but mine is an antique white. No damage. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Holdener

customer_reviews.title: Poor antiquing finish.
customer_reviews.text: Cute design, but the paint color was not the same as the photo, and the antiquing paint finish was very amateurish. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nechan

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come gold. More of an old rustic color. I spray painted it gold and moved on lol
customer_reviews.author: Yoshiko

customer_reviews.title: I love this piece
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece, it's lovely--after I got the first, I ordered another, will be a great addition to my yard when people are over/ holidays, I will hang it my house when not in use outside. I ordered wax dipped remote control candles to keep it neat and easy to use. It's a cool eclectic little piece of art!
customer_reviews.author: DEB AMALFITANO

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier! A little string of crystals and a crystal ball later, my DIY is perfect for hanging above the tub. Chic it is!
customer_reviews.author: Up and Over

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift to my sis ~ we loved it, loved the price
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my sis ~ we loved it, loved the price, and I would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Repainted this chandelier and added some crystals to give it a more glamorous look. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shaunda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in our garden gazebo for my son's wedding. Once I opened the box I realized that I liked it so much it will have to used in our guest room after the event.
customer_reviews.author: MagPi

customer_reviews.title: but it looks wonderful hanging outside with flameless
customer_reviews.text: It came a little battered and bent, but it looks wonderful hanging outside with flameless candles
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! I have this chandelier hanging in my garden with small solar lights. Romantic for wine in the garden by the fire pit.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for the money spent. Nicely made
